org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.app

Interface ProjectListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BicycleGeometryWorkshopUI

    public interface ProjectListener
    The listener interface for receiving project events. This is used by the UI as a link between the project and navigator panel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bicycleAdded(Bicycle bicycle)
      Invoked when a bicycle is added to the project.
      void bicycleChanged()
      Invoked when when a Bicycle changed event occurs.
      void bicycleDeleted(Bicycle bicycle)
      Invoked when a bicycle is deleted from the project.
      void bicycleMovedDown(Bicycle bicycle)
      Invoked when a bicycle is moved down in the list.
      void bicycleMovedUp(Bicycle bicycle)
      Invoked when a bicycle is moved up in the list.
      void bicycleRestored(Bicycle bicycle, int index)
      Invoked when a bicycle is restored from an undo delete.
      void projectedLoadedFromDB()
      Invoked when the project is loaded from the database.
      void redrawViewer()
      Invoked when the project viewer need to be redrawn.
      void updateReport()
      Invoked when the report needs to be updated.

    • Method Detail

      • redrawViewer

        void redrawViewer()
        Invoked when the project viewer need to be redrawn. This will redraw all the bicycles in the project.

      • bicycleChanged

        void bicycleChanged()
        Invoked when when a Bicycle changed event occurs.

      • updateReport

        void updateReport()
        Invoked when the report needs to be updated.

      • projectedLoadedFromDB

        void projectedLoadedFromDB()
        Invoked when the project is loaded from the database.

      • bicycleAdded

        void bicycleAdded(Bicycle bicycle)
        Invoked when a bicycle is added to the project.
        Parameters:
        bicycle - The Bicycle that was added.

      • bicycleRestored

        void bicycleRestored(Bicycle bicycle,
                     int index)
        Invoked when a bicycle is restored from an undo delete.
        Parameters:
        bicycle - The bicycle that was restored.
        index - The position of the bicycle in the list.

      • bicycleMovedUp

        void bicycleMovedUp(Bicycle bicycle)
        Invoked when a bicycle is moved up in the list.
        Parameters:
        bicycle - The bicycle that is moved up.

      • bicycleMovedDown

        void bicycleMovedDown(Bicycle bicycle)
        Invoked when a bicycle is moved down in the list.
        Parameters:
        bicycle - The bicycle that is moved down.

      • bicycleDeleted

        void bicycleDeleted(Bicycle bicycle)
        Invoked when a bicycle is deleted from the project.
        Parameters:
        bicycle - The deleted bicycle.
